ctx: intros P H1 H2 H3 l x x' H4.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type X : Type Red : reduction_t X P : Lbl -> X -> X -> Prop H1 : forall x : X, P T x x H2 : forall (y : X) (l : Lbl) (x z : X), Red T x y -> Weak l y z -> P l y z -> P l x z H3 : forall (y : X) (a : A) (x z : X), Red (L a) x y -> Weak T y z -> P T y z -> P (L a) x z l : Lbl x, x' : X H4 : Weak l x x' The term "x" has type "X" while it is expected to have type "Lbl".

ctx: intros P H1 H2 H3 l x x' H4.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type X : Type Red : reduction_t X P : Lbl -> X -> X -> Prop H1 : forall x : X, P T x x H2 : forall (y : X) (l : Lbl) (x z : X), Red T x y -> Weak l y z -> P l y z -> P l x z H3 : forall (y : X) (a : A) (x z : X), Red (L a) x y -> Weak T y z -> P T y z -> P (L a) x z l : Lbl x, x' : X H4 : Weak l x x' Unable to unify "Weak l x x'" with "P l x x'".

ctx: intros P H1 H2 H3 l x x' H4.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type X : Type Red : reduction_t X P : Lbl -> X -> X -> Prop H1 : forall x : X, P T x x H2 : forall (y : X) (l : Lbl) (x z : X), Red T x y -> Weak l y z -> P l y z -> P l x z H3 : forall (y : X) (a : A) (x z : X), Red (L a) x y -> Weak T y z -> P T y z -> P (L a) x z l : Lbl x, x' : X H4 : Weak l x x' Unable to unify "star (Red T) ?M1491 ?M1491" with "P l x x'".

original: intros P H1 H2 H3 l x x' H4. apply (weak_taus x x' l). apply H4. apply weak_refl.
